GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
rtc: mt6397: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit da38e86d6cf6dd3bc65c602d998f357145aa1a0b, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit fc2979118f3f5193475cb53d5df7bdaa7e358a42. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rtc: mt6397: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()
